name: Heroes of Might and Magic 2: The Succession Wars
name_original: Heroes of Might and Magic 2: The Succession Wars
description:
Heroes of Might and Magic 2: The Succession Wars is a strategy game developed by New World Computing. It came out on 01-10-1996. 3DO Company, The published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Heroes of Might and Magic 2: The Succession Wars is available on PC. You can purchase the game on GOG.
It was directed by Jon Van Caneghem.
